title: dutch typefaces
content: would anyone know of any clean and modern looking dutch typefaces?
author: acarhuayo

comments.content: Museo Sans is always popular with Typophiles. You might also look at everything by Lucas de Groot.

[Typotheque](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typotheque)  
 [Underware](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Underware)  
 [Letterror](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Letterror)  
 [Dutch Type Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dutch%20Type%20Library)  
 [TEFF](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ensched%C3%A9)

[ReType](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/www.re-type.com/)  
 [Evert Bloemsma](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Evert%20Bloemsma)  
 [Peter Verheul](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/www.farhill.nl/)  
 [Rene Verkaart](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ReneVerkaart)  
 [Paul van der Laan](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20van%20der%20Laan)

[The Netherlands](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/www.myfonts.com/country/nl/) at MyFonts.com  
 [Dutch Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/node/45010) (a great book about the Dutch type scene) by [Jan Middendorp](http://web.archive.org/web/20130316111301/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jan%20Middendorp)
